verses.1: A thuman ka Pasian aw, ka hong sap ciangin hong dawng in. Gimna ka thuak ciangin nopsakna nong pia hi. Kei hong hehpih inla, ka thungetna hong za in.
verses.2: Mite aw, ka minphatna in bang tanvei daina thuak ding ahi hiam? Bang tanvei thumawkna deihin zuau thu zong ding na hi uh hiam?
verses.3: Ahih hangin Topa in ama adingin miphate a tuam koih lam thei ta un. Keʼn ka sap ciangin Topa in hong za hi.
verses.4: Lau-in liing unla, mawhna peel un. Na lupna tung uh ah lungngai phapha unla, om khikhe un.
verses.5: A man biakpiaknate lui unla, Topa muang un.
verses.6: Mi tampi in, “Thupha tampi hong pia in. Ko tungah na maitang vang hong taangsak in, Topa!” ci uh hi.
verses.7: Amaute, an le leengtui a hauh cianga a nuam uh sangin nuamna lian zaw ka lung sungah nong guan hi.
verses.8: Nuam takin lumin ka ihmu ta ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa aw, nangmah bek in lungmuanna munah na hong omsak hi.
